mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bannedwords (wordno, word, reason, rdate) VALUES (bannedwords_seq.nextval, #{word}, #{reason}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT wordno, word, reason, rdate FROM bannedwords ORDER BY wordno DESC
SELECT wordno, word, reason, rdate FROM bannedwords WHERE wordno = #{wordno} ORDER BY wordno DESC

SELECT wordno, word, reason, rdate FROM bannedwords WHERE (#{word} IS NULL OR #{word} = '' OR LOWER(word) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{word} || '%')) ORDER BY wordno DESC OFFSET #{startRow} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bannedwords WHERE (#{word} IS NULL OR #{word} = '' OR LOWER(word) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{word} || '%'))

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT wordno, word, reason, rdate ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY wordno DESC) AS rnum FROM bannedwords WHERE (#{word} IS NULL OR #{word} = '' OR LOWER(word) LIKE LOWER('%' || #{word} || '%')) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
